author: Fox News
title: Hannity accuses Biden of sabotaging US national security for 'radical climate' agenda: 'It's checkmate'
description: Sean Hannity blasts President Biden for failing to ramp up energy production amid Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
content: Sean Hannity accused President Biden Thursday of listening to "radical climate alarmists" who are out of touch with national security even as Russian President Vladimir Putin continues his aggressiveâ€¦ [+4389 chars]
